item.description: You are invited to our Meet Up dance party Sunday evenings at the Knights of Columbus Hall in Salem Mass. The doors open at 7:30 to 11;30 PM for an evening of dance adventure and romance. Possibly meet that special one. A 4,000 square foot hall is available to our group of 300+ dancers. Smart causal attire, jeans OK, and $10 admission. Dancers can bring your favorite music Cd's and we will play some special requests. Beginner dance lesson with a guest dance instructor. Parking is available around the Salem Common and in the rear lot of the building. There is room for many and bring lots of your friends. Don't miss out of this great night of dance fun. Hope to see you at the next dance Meet Up, C. J.
item.name: Aspire, "Singles Dance Party" Meet Up North Shore
